amendment.description: Making further continuing appropriations for fiscal year 2016, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2922 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2922 proposed by Senator McConnell. (consideration: CR S8586; text: CR S8586) Making further continuing appropriations for fiscal year 2016, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2922 proposed by Senator McConnell.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2922 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
